{"id":1127899058,"question_id":2717,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1703484517,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1127899058/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Collect Coins in a Tree","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int collectTheCoins(int[] coins, int[][] edges) {\n        HashMap<Integer, List<Integer>> g = new HashMap<>();\n        HashMap<Integer, Integer> indeg = new HashMap<>();\n        for(int[] e : edges){\n            indeg.put(e[0], indeg.getOrDefault(e[0], 0)+1);\n            indeg.put(e[1], indeg.getOrDefault(e[1], 0)+1);\n            g.putIfAbsent(e[0], new ArrayList<>());\n            g.putIfAbsent(e[1], new ArrayList<>());\n            g.get(e[0]).add(e[1]);\n            g.get(e[1]).add(e[0]);\n        }\n\n        Queue<Integer> q = new LinkedList<>();\n        for(Map.Entry<Integer, Integer> en : indeg.entrySet()){\n            if(en.getValue()==1){\n                q.offer(en.getKey());\n            }\n        }\n        int k = 1;\n        while(!q.isEmpty() && k-->0){\n            int siz = q.size();\n            for(int i=0; i<siz; i++){\n                int p = q.poll();\n                for(int next : g.getOrDefault(p, new ArrayList<>())){\n                    indeg.remove(next);\n                }\n                indeg.remove(p);\n            }\n        }\n\n        int nodeCnt = indeg.keySet().size();\n        int edgeCnt = nodeCnt-1;\n        return 2*edgeCnt;\n\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"collect-coins-in-a-tree","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
